page.title: 17INDUSTRY Melton Ross Elsham
page.content: Elsham Wold "Motorway" Industrial and Warehousing Estate is a recent development, occupying a former airfield site, mainly derelict land, surrounded by high grade farmland. It is situated high on the Wolds,offering many attractive open views of the sur- rounding countryside. The estate has dual carriageway access direct to the Humber Bridge and the sea ports of Hull, Grimsby and Immingham. It is also close to the intersection of two major routes M180/A180 and the A15. It is convenient for access to rail facilities at Barnetby (2 miles) and air facilities at Humberside Airport (4 miles).Elsham Wold Estate therefore offers unique opportunities for large scale distributive industries,particu- laly those generating large volumes of heavy traffic,because of it's relative remoteness from centres of popn. conti
